keywords.indexterm: NISO Journal Article Tag Suite document type

body.p: The JATS (NISO Journal Article Tag Suite) document type is a technical standard that defines an XML format for scientific literature.

section.title: File Definition
section.p: A file is considered to be a JATS document when the PUBLIC ID of the document contains the string -//NLM//DTD.

section.title: Default Document Templates
section.p: There are some default JATS templates available when creating new documents from templatesnew documents from templates, including Archiving, Authoring, Book, and Publishing.
The default templates for JATS documents are located in the /frameworks/jats/templates/ folder.

section.title: Default Schema
section.p: Default schemas that are used if one is not detected in the JATS document are stored in /frameworks/jats/lib/schemas/.

section.title: Default CSS
section.p: The default CSS files used for rendering JATS content in Author mode are stored in /frameworks/jats/lib/author-css/.
By default, these default CSS files are merged with any that are specified in the document. For more information, see .

section.title: Default XML Catalog
section.p: The default XML Catalog, jatskit-catalog.xml, is stored in /frameworks/jats/lib/schemas/.
